name: GHOST 001
description:
The Soviet Union was retreating steadily under the powerful offensive of the Empire Allies. You are the only survivor in this battle. You received the last mission from your commander: use the remaining forces to secure the fortress. 

The inspiration for the game comes from Red Alert. Our game incorporates a point and clicks interface with pathfinding and navmesh agents. In this game, the player needs to select the army and navigate them to the enemies. 

Controls:

[WASD/mouse] pan the camera around the map

[Esc] pause

Select: drag a rectangle around multiple forces

Movement: right-click to move 

Attack: move close to the enemies; auto-attack

Zoom in/out: scroll up/down
